h2_title: Emerald-Armed Mantis Boss Fight and Guide
content: It's only when the mantis' health bar drops to around 70% that the fight changes drastically. A cutscene will  and the mantis will sharpen its blades, then dip them in the liquid, pulling them out so that they're now red.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Emerald-Armed_Mantis.md', within the main section titled 'Emerald-Armed Mantis', specifically from the subsection 'Emerald-Armed Mantis Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
It's only when the mantis' health bar drops to around 70% that the fight changes drastically. A cutscene will  and the mantis will sharpen its blades, then dip them in the liquid, pulling them out so that they're now red.
